             VirtualView view)
        customized constructor
        Parameters:
        iWantFrenzyMode - if the player wants the frenzy
        easyMode - if the player wants 5 skulls or 8
        usernames - usernames of the players
        boardJsonName - board chosen
        view - reference to the view
